quests.desc: You are now playing a life changing round of TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to recover the American limited edition keycard from the box. And then, make absolutely sure that the American limited edition portal is unlocked. And then, ensure that the American limited edition portal in the studio is open. And then, make an effort to take a trip north. And then, take the type Y key from the table. After that, make it so that the type Y portal in the study is unlocked. And then, ensure that the type Y portal inside the study is open. And then, make an attempt to take a trip east. With that done, move east. Next, pick-up the mop from the floor of the laundromat. That's it!
commands: take American limited edition keycard from box
unlock American limited edition portal with American limited edition keycard
take type Y key from table
unlock type Y portal with type Y key
take American limited edition keycard from box
unlock American limited edition portal with American limited edition keycard
take type Y key from table
unlock type Y portal with type Y key

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You've entered a laundromat. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookhouse. An usual kind of place.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a saucepan. The saucepan is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the saucepan you see [a list of things on the s_1]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type Y portal leading west. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a study.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a table. What a great pairing of adjectives and nouns! [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the table. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But there isn't a thing on it. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a table in a room.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type Y portal leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] American limited edition portal leading south.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. A normal kind of place.

 You see a chair. [if there is something on the s_2]On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a studio. A normal one.

 You make out a box. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] American limited edition portal leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You are in a pantry. A normal one.



 There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut gateway leading east. There is [if d_11 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden portal leading west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Of every bedroom you could have shown up in, you had to show up in a normal one.



 There is [if d_11 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden portal leading east. There is [if d_12 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an attic. A standard one.



 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] birch portal leading east. There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut gateway leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a vault.

 You can see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker in the room.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] You see a formless safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The formless safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] birch portal leading west. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] maple hatch leading east. There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone hatch leading north.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cubicle. A standard kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.



 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gateway leading north. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] maple hatch leading west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a lounge.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the mantelpiece you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone hatch leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've entered a shower. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a rack. [if there is something on the s_4]On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_4]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You're now in a cellar. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see a toolbox. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The toolbox is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a bedchamber.

 You see a suitcase.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a bed. Does this look like anything mentioned in the instructions? [if there is something on the s_5]On the bed you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

 There is [if d_13 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
A crooked signboard tells you that you are now in the office.

 You can make out [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 6 box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The type 6 box contains [a list of things in the c_5]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the parlor.

 You can make out a bench. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a bench, go to TextWorld. The bench is typical.[if there is something on the s_6] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a mantle! The mantle is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the mantle you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the recreation zone. You can barely contain your excitement.

 [if c_6 is locked]A locked[else if c_6 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] safe is right there by you.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_6]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You arrive in a basement. An ordinary one. Let's see what's in here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. An ordinary kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out a bookshelf. The bookshelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the bookshelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] The bookshelf appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_13 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is [if d_12 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can make out a dresser.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The dresser is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gateway leading south.

walkthrough: take American limited edition keycard from box
unlock American limited edition portal with American limited edition keycard
take type Y key from table
unlock type Y portal with type Y key

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First of all, you could, like, retrieve the American limited edition keycard from the box inside the studio. After that, unlock the American limited edition portal within the studio with the American limited edition keycard. And then, ensure that the American limited edition portal within the studio is open. Then, make an attempt to go north. Then, take the type Y key from the table within the study. After that, insert the type Y key into the type Y portal's lock to unlock it. After unlocking the type Y portal, open the type Y portal inside the study. And then, travel east. With that done, take a trip east. And then, retrieve the mop from the floor of the laundromat. And if you do that, you're the winner!
